title: Dream Realm (Part 7)
body:
Dream Realm (Part 7)

Boom! Bang! - - -

"Hahahahahaha... " A laughter that was full of madness echoed throughout the dream realm.

Several monsters were obliterated as powerful laser beams rained down from the sky.

Noah looked at the Giant Robot that was in the sky with a blank look on his face. He was feeling suffocated and his soul was screaming in pain because the monsters that he created using his spiritual power were being destroyed by the Giant Robot.

But the shock that he was feeling was even greater than the pain that was coming from his soul so he didn't even flinch from his position even though his soul was screaming.

"What the fu*k is wrong with this bastard," Noah muttered with a blank look on his face.
